data.text: Ndiela yimbidila mamboti manneni ma Yave
Ndiela samuna ti luzolo luaku luidi lutelama dio ngui mu zithangu zioso.
Ngeyo wutuba :
Ndiela bieka nkunꞌaku mu zithangu zioso ;
Diyilu dinzitisa matsiminanga maku, a Yave
Bila nani mu matuti wulenda dedokoso banga Yave ?
Mu lukutukunu lu banlongo, Nzambi wulembo kinzuku ngolo
A Yave, Nzambi nkua ngolo yoso, nani widi banga ngeyo e ?
Ngeyo weti yadila mbu wufuemini,
Ngeyo wukosikisa Lahabi banga mutu wuvondo
Ngeyo vuidi diyilu ayi ntoto diaka ngeyo vuidi wawu.
Ngeyo wuvanga Nodi ayi Sude ;
Koko kuaku kufulukidi mu lulendo ;
Busonga ayi bufuana biawu fundasio
Lusakumunu kuidi batu bobo banlonguka kubudila zitsiaki ;
Beti mona khini mu dizina diaku mu lumbu kimvimba
Bila ngeyo nkembo awu ayi zingolo ziawu
Bukiedika, nkaku eto wuviulu kuidi Yave
Khumbu yimosi ngeyo wuyolukila mu tsongolo
Ndibakula Davidi kisadi kiama,
Koko kuama kuela kunsimba ;
Kadi mbeni yimosi yilendi kutula ku tsi minsua miandi ko.
Ndiela kosikisa va meso mandi batu bobo beti kunlenda
Luzolo luama lukuikama luela ba yandi
Ndiela tula koko kuandi va mbata mbu
Niandi wela kuthela :
Ndiela kunsobula diaka muanꞌama wutheti
Ndiela simbidila luzolo luama va niandi
Ndiela telimisa dio ngui nkunꞌandi mu zithangu zioso
Enati bana bandi balozidi Mina miama
enati babundudi zinzengolo ziama
ndiela tumbudila masumu mawu mu lusuadi,
vayi ndilendi ba botula ko luzolo luama mu niandi
Ndilendi ba bundula Nguizani ama ko
Mu khumbu yimosi,
Buna nkunꞌandi wela zingilanga mu zithangu zioso
Kiela ba kitelama dio ngui mu zithangu zioso
Vayi ngeyo wunloza, wunlenza ;
Ngeyo wuvonda Nguizani ayi kisadi kiaku ;
Ngeyo wumana tiolumuna bibaka biandi bioso
Babo baviokila vana, banziona bima ;
Ngeyo wuzangula koko ku lubakala
Ngeyo wuvengumuna meno ma sabala kiandi
Ngeyo wumanisa kiezila kiandi
Ngeyo wukufisa bilumbu bi bumuana buandi ;
Nate thangu mbi a Yave wela suamina e ?
Tebuka moyo boso luzingu luama luididi lukhufi.
Mutu mbi wowo lenda zinga ayi wela kambu mona lufua e ?
A Yave, kuevi kuidi luzolo luaku lunene lukhulu,
Tebukila moyo a Pfumu, buevi kisadi kiaku bakisekinina ;
Bifingu biobi bambeni ziaku basekinina,
Nzitusu kuidi Yave mu zithangu zioso.
